timeline-error-storage: Used as error message when the outputted files cannot be stored
timeline-error-temp: Used as error message when temporary files cannot be created
timeline-error-command: Used as error message when executing a command failed. $1 is the command that was run.
timeline-invalidmap: Used as error message if failed to load XML or the first node in XML is not "map".
timeline-tracking-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name of the tracking category for pages using this extension
timeline-tracking-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|timeline-tracking-category}} tracking category.
timeline-readerr: Displayed if the extension could not read a file. $1 is the path to the file that could not be read.
timeline-scripterr: Displayed when a script fails to run for unspecified reasons
timeline-perlnotexecutable: Displayed when Perl cannot be executed. $1 is the path to the Perl binary
timeline-ploticusnotexecutable: Displayed when Ploticus cannot be executed. $1 is the path to the Ploticus binary
timeline-compilererr: Displayed if EasyTimeline could not compile the input text. $1 is any error output wrapped in a <nowiki><pre></nowiki> tag.
timeline-rsvg-error: Displayed if rsvg could not convert the SVG into a PNG. $1 is any error output wrapped in a <nowiki><pre></nowiki> tag.
